overview: Tukummeq and Luna are facing a turning point in their relationship. An opportunity arises for them to finally present themselves as a couple to Lunaâ€™s mother, but Luna hesitates. In search of a decision, Tukummeq tells Luna the myth of the loon and the raven; how the loon was gifted its beautiful patterns, and how she, in an act of love, accidentally ruined the ravens. Which path will Luna decide for herself and Tukummeq?
title: Tuullik
